divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my car sitting in park my brother was getting his groceries out the trunk he went into the house and then my daughter was yelling mommy she was sitting in the front seat. Next to me I look to my right we saw what look like a small.triangle shape object 3 bright whites it was so close to us it was like 30 feet in the air and probably 20 feet away from us it just drove straight as it got behind the house it disappeared fast we heard a slight sound coming from it at the time there was also a black helicopter that I just saw take off like 3 minutes before we saw the UFO the helicopter is a life light it came from Allegheny general hospital we only got to see this object for 10 to 12 second only. This thing was very low and when it went behind the house it disappeared
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around February 8th 2012
Summary: small triangle shape object bright white lights
